fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We captioned an image as showing London’s Westminster Bridge in 1955; however, as many readers pointed out, the presence of trams and tramlines dates the picture to before July 1952, when the capital’s first-generation tram network was closed (Back to the future as road traffic drops to 1955 levels, 4 April, page 11). • Other recently amended articles include: NHS staff warned to hide ID after spate of targeted muggings Coronavirus: a test strategy that failed Jennifer Bate obituary My favourite film aged 12: Speed NHS faces shortfall of ventilators as manufacturers struggle Major drug-gang shootout leaves 19 dead in northern Mexico Are mortgage payment holidays really a good idea? California megachurch linked to spread of more than 70 coronavirus cases
